suspect.describe: 从提交的证明中，不足以确定作弊行为，但以上证据存在可疑地方，如果有足够证明材料可更改石锤

innocent.describe: 证明材料中，有足够信息能确定没有作弊行为

discuss.describe: 以上证据仍然需要更多管理员和玩家参与讨论决定，不确定行为

guilt.describe: 管理员认为作弊，投一票，满足条件系统将确认玩家状态

invalid.describe: 举报材料不全或举报错误ID等行为

more.describe: 需要补充更多有力的证据

tip.notFound: 哎列，访问地址似乎走失

form.showOriginDescribe: 是否让你绑定的Origin在BFBAN可见
form.allowDMdescribe: 是否接受信息. 更多消息信息前往 [消息列表] 查看
form.languageSyncDescribe: 设置此处选项，在登录后同步程序本地语言，如果退出登录将回退到本地程序所持久保存的语言

modifyName.title: 修改名称
modifyName.specification1: 你正在修改您的账户名称，这代表网站内看见都会更变，并且同时登录的ID同时变动,如果您不小心忘记新账户id，可能无法找回此账户，影响绑定的orgin账户，你需要通过非常长的人工审核.
modifyName.residueDegree: 目前剩余修改名称{changeNameLeft}次数

appeal.describe: 该举报信息存在问题,我能自证或他人协助证明清白.

placeholder.content: 请详细填写您申诉信息以便审核

info.discription1: If you found could not visit battlefieldtracker or he changed Origin ID,please Click
info.discription2: bfban.com can track hacker newest ID
info.discription3: server can update hacker who is on the list on schedule
info.discription4: history ID which they used before can be found too
info.replyManual1: If you have new picture or video evidence to be maintained,you can report one more time.Otherwise,you can only reply text or link by replying here.if you want to add picture click here
info.replyManual2: and then copy the picture link to reply
info.replyManual3: You must be a BFban member to discuss with us together
info.appealManual1: Ban Appeals: Please send this case's web page link and appealing to ban-appeals@bfban.com .
info.adminManual1: Do not judge by your will,if you are not confirmed,then use the reply function above,and waiting for more evidence
info.adminManual2: any action here by admin will make a status change for this reported player，if you are not 100% confirmed,please use reply function above
info.replyManual4: You must log in to reply

fastReplies.evidencePic: As the evidence showed in the picture
fastReplies.evidenceVid: As the evidence showed in the video

messages.pleaseExplain: Please explian your decision in details
messages.changeHacker: The current person is in confirmed hacker state, are you sure you want to change it to {code} status?

info.notFoundHintQuestion1: But I've just met him in game/I can find him on battlefield tracker?
info.notFoundHintAnswer1: Please visit origin.com to search that player. If this player can be found but the report can't be made, you can send us bug report via the contact methods on the bottom of the frontpage.
info.notFoundHintQuestion2: I can't find him on origin, what can I do?
info.notFoundHintAnswer2: That is probably because EA didnot update their database in time，or their system bugged, and we are unable to help them fix that bug. If you do wish to help, you can visit       https://answers.ea.com/t5/Origin-Client-Web-Technical/bd-p/origin-technical-issues-en       , the official froum to send bug report，you can describe this situation as: I can't search my friend by name on origin.
info.reportNews: We offer the function to report BFV hackers！
info.idNotion1: You can only report one ID one time，do not write the platoon name，do not write your ID
info.idNotion2: Origin ID has no match for lower case and upper case，but you must identify i I 1 l L o O 0，offer correct ID
info.uploadManual1: if you do not want to register video site member such as Bilibili and Youtube,you can go to
info.uploadManual2: and then paste the video link below
info.uploadManual3: you can offer your video by Bilibili,Youtube,Youku,Tudou and more
info.uploadPic1: We recommend you to upload those types of screenshot such as png, jpg, jpeg, gif
info.uploadPic2: picture which is larger than 2M would upload failed,you can go to
info.uploadPic3: and then choose Image URL Tag，paste the image link below
info.uploadPic4: please make a discription for this hacker with evidence，Text editor offer image upload service（Size limits:2M）
info.description: List as much evidence as possible about the reported person
info.onlyOneId: Only one origin ID at a time
info.loginExpired: Your login has expired, please re-login.

error.mediaEvidence: Please upload a picture or fill in the video link
error.originId: Origin ID does not exist, please check spelling

col1.text: 联BFBAN - 全球作弊玩家数据库

h2: 提供☁️数据库，使得来自全球不同Battlefield服务器，得以监控移除存在问题档案玩家
无论从BF1到BF2042都支持问题档案玩家查询，使得来自全球不同Battlefield服务器得以监控
cover.h3: 建立起全球作弊玩家档案库
cover.h4: 成为我们一员 - 维护社区环境
cover.subButton: 了解有那些社区已经加入

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: bfban.com was made on the 4th of november 2018 and received {report} reports, and has a total of {cheater} banned hackers. Thanks for the hard work everyone!

about.title: About
about.description:
BFBAN

诞生于2018年1月29日； 是战地玩家一起组建的 抵制外挂 组织。
about.website:
bfban.com 网站依托于联BAN调查局，最初想法起源于热心玩家，由 mygoare 开发，于 2018年11月4日 上线‘

主要为广大玩家提供举报、列举、搜索、追踪、讨论等服务；
about.privacy:
隐私政策

它是开源的。您可以通过 GitHub 发布问题并提出更改/改进建议。社区网络提供的 API 并开放供公众使用。

account.title: User info
account.hint2: Everyone can post responses on the report page.
account.hint3: If you have more evidence for a hacker, please report the same id twice.

form.submitHint: Do not have account? Go Sign up

registerVerification.failure: 错误的验证地址，请检查验证码是否正确
